Class ActionFormMessageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util.ActionFormMessageUtil

extends java.lang.Object

      • fillAttributesInString

        public static java.lang.String fillAttributesInString​(ActionFormMessage instance,
                                                      java.lang.String value)
        Replaces the message attributes in a string. The attribute in a string must be defined like the following: 
        #{<attribute-name>} E.g.: #{label}
        Parameters:
        instance - Instance that contains the message.
        value - String before the replacement.
        Returns:
        String after the replacement.

      • fillAttributesInString

        public static java.lang.String fillAttributesInString​(ActionFormMessage instance,
                                                      java.lang.String value,
                                                      java.util.Locale language)
        Replaces the message attributes in a string. The attribute in a string must be defined like the following: 
        #{<attribute-name>} E.g.: #{label}
        Parameters:
        instance - Instance that contains the message.
        value - String before the replacement.
        language - Instance that contains the language.
        Returns:
        String after the replacement.
